review: Dr. Shubhangini Gandhi is an excellent Doctor.  Me and my family members have consulted her for dental issues from time to time.  And the experience has been good. She takes time to explain the pros and cons of the treatment so that we can make an independence choice. I highly recommend her for all dental issues.

review: Iâ€™ve been going to Dr Shubhangini Gandhi  for the last 12 years.She is a Very experienced and patient Doctor with a  steady hand and most importantly procedures are not painful,  she makes  the patient comfortable .Clean and hygienic clinic with state of the  art machines . I got a RCT and dental implant and both procedures were done to my complete satisfaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I went for a wisdom tooth extraction and was very nervous about the procedure. She patiently cleared my doubts and explained the whole process involved. The extraction took less than 15 minutes and was painless, I didn't even feel a thing. I needed laser gum surgery around another tooth which was also painless.

Doctor was quite experienced to diagnose the root cause of the pain  and explained in depth about the  possibile causes besides preferred treatment options currently available.

She was quite hospitable and replied all my queries to my satisfaction.

I would recommend the doctor to all those having similar problems.

H
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words of appreciation. Means a lot to us
